schema:creator: Zhang, Sophie
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ This piece is a digital painting created with the program Procreate. It is intended to capture the feeling of isolation during this time but with a positive spin on the situation: how distancing ourselves from society allows us to slow down the pace of our lives to reflect on our actions and to appreciate the natural beauty around us.  
 __Participant age:__ 17  
 __Category:__  Adult Age 15+: Graphic Art
schema:name: Isolated
